command: bash -c $* -- eval source /etc/sysconfig/memcached; if [ {{ .memcachedAuthOptions }} != '' ]; then echo $PASSWORD |saslpasswd2 -a memcached -c $USERNAME; chown memcached:memcached /etc/memcached /etc/sasl2/sasldb2; export SASL_CONF_PATH=/etc/memcached/memcached.conf; dnf install cyrus-sasl-plain -y; fi; exec /usr/bin/memcached -p ${PORT} -u ${USER} -m ${CACHESIZE} -c ${MAXCONN} $OPTIONS
